entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 37. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 46 in the evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
